pages.text: The $(item)Tacituryllis$() is a carnivorous plant, catching all bugs silently, leaving the area quiet from all of these nasty noises.$(br)Its scent leaves you in a sleepless trance state.$(br2)Maybe meditating next to it might bring even more $(marked)silence$().

In order to create the Tacituryllis a $(l:vitalis/entry_seed)Dormant Seed$() must be swallowed under the emotion of $(marked)silence$() while in the $(marked)Overworld$(), at least at height 120 and at night, with no entities nearby.$(br2)$(o)Total silence. Perfect.$()
